Title: Relates to training of day care center employees in the administration of opioid antagonists
Summary: Requires that at least one employee at each family day care center, group family day care center, school-aged child care program, and child day care center be trained in administering an opioid antagonist.
LawCode: Amd ยง390-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring at least one employee of each child day care to be trained in administering an opioid antagonist
